attributes.action: Close the door on immigration the uk is an island thats bursting with immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do you think the goverment should stop allowing people to come and live in our country, stop using our resources, sending the money back to thier native countries, taking our housing, our jobs, most of all our identity and our culture. if you think the goverment needs to do something about this situation we are finding ourselves in, please add your names. thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
